author: cnbc.com
title: The Ensign Group Declares Quarterly Dividend of $0.045 Per Share
text:
MISSION VIEJO, Calif., March 20, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The Ensign Group, Inc. (NASDAQ:ENSG), the parent company of the Ensign™ group of skilled nursing, rehabilitative care services, home health, home care, hospice care and assisted living companies, today announced that it has declared a quarterly cash dividend of $0.045 per share of Ensign common stock, payable on or before April 30, 2018, to shareholders of record as of March 31, 2018. Ensign has been a dividend-paying company since 2002.
About Ensign ™
The Ensign Group, Inc.'s independent operating subsidiaries provide a broad spectrum of skilled nursing and assisted living services, physical, occupational and speech therapies, home health and hospice services and other rehabilitative and healthcare services at 232 healthcare facilities, twenty-two hospice agencies, twenty home health agencies and four home care businesses in California, Arizona, Texas, Washington, Utah, Idaho, Colorado, Nevada, Iowa, Nebraska, Oregon, Wisconsin, Kansas, South Carolina and Oklahoma. More information about Ensign is available at http://www.ensigngroup.net .
Contact Information
